name: Eternal Recursion
description:
For the Rowan 2023 Game Jam following the theme of "Recursion"

After a string of bizarre nightmares, you find your world thrust into a time loop, where everything and everyone repeats.  Realizing that you and your friends are the only ones not affected by the events of the recursion, you must travel to Tartarus in hopes of breaking the recursion in your world.

Made in RPG Maker MZ
